channel.title: [ZenithScape] Need Help Adding Admin Crown to Friends Chat
channel.description: Hello! I've searched google and even asked some coders of other servers (some of which were not too pleasant to answer :P). I've done searches everywhere, and I can't find it. Could someone help me find the Friends Chat ranks (for the FC interface) serverside? In regular Runescape, Jagex Moderators have a crown when they talk, and their rank is a gold crown, which is what I am attempting to do. I have the gold crown when they talk, but not as the rank. I found the sprite image for the crown, so can someone please tell me where I can find all of the ranks configurations (server-side)? By the way, the server has the base Zenithscape 721/728. I'll rep anyone who gets me to it successfully :D.

item.title: [ZenithScape] Need Help Adding Admin Crown to Friends Chat
item.dc:creator: @sundays211 sundays211
item.description:
@sundays211 wrote:

Not sure if it’s what you need, but the admin rank in the friends chat list is given by sending the user’s channel rank as 127 (where 0 is normally for guest, 1 for recruit, 2 for corporal, etc (7 for owner)).

Read full topic
item.source: [ZenithScape] Need Help Adding Admin Crown to Friends Chat
